name: Space Monkeys - Defenders of Earth
description:
Game realised for Brains Eden 2019 by team Premium Pancakes

How To Play
  • Defend the planet from asteroids!
  • Chain up explosion for more score
  • Every 3 chained explosions, your multiplier increases
Credits

Giandomenico Lombardi (Team Lead) - Technical Game Designer
Rob Peerlings - 3D Artist
Iuliia Kivenko - UI Designer/Artist
Dan Velinov - Technical Level Designer
Marcel de Boer - 3D Artist

Additional Credits Engine

Unreal Engine 4.22.3 - Epic Games

Code

LE Extended Library - obtained from Epic Games Marketplace

Audio

Pizza Panic (soundtrack) - permitted to use by original composer Max Blom
Retro 8 bits sounds - obtained from Epic Games Marketplace

Fonts

Arcade Classics - by Jakob Fischer at www.pizzadude.dk
Digital 7 - by Sizenko Alexander
FT Digital
